entry.en: Zeta Quantum Capital Limited, established in 2024 in Hong Kong, is a leading asset management firm specializing in quantitative trading, algorithm development, and portfolio management. With roots tracing back to 2020, our innovative models have been rigorously developed and refined over the years, delivering consistent performance with a maximum drawdown of less than 20% over four years.
entry.zh: 泽塔量化资本有限公司（Zeta Quantum Capital Limited）于2024年在香港成立，是一家专注于量化交易、算法开发和资产管理的领先机构。我们的模型最早可追溯至2020年，经过多年的严格开发和优化，实现了稳定的绩效表现，四年来最大回撤不超过20%。

entry.en: I was blown away by his creativity in creating a memorable brand identity. His design work hashelped us stand out.
entry.zh: 我被他创造令人难忘的品牌形象的创造力所震撼。他的设计工作有帮助我们脱颖而出。

entry.en: I could not be happier with the results of our collaboration. He took our vision and brought it to life.
entry.zh: 我对我们的合作成果感到非常高兴。他接受了我们的愿景并将其变为现实。

entry.en: It was a pleasure working on a design project and I must say that the experience exceeded allmy expectations.
entry.zh: 从事设计项目是一种乐趣，我必须说这种体验超越了一切我的期望。
